BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.label: blight
BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.letterText: Blight has been discovered on the {PLANTDEF_labelPlural}! \nYou should cut or burn the affected plants before the blight spreads.

BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.label: boomblight
BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.letterText: Boomblight has been discovered on the {PLANTDEF_labelPlural}! \nEngineered long ago to improve crop yields by 50%, Boomblight has a side-effect of making crops intensely flammable. \nYou can cut the affected plants before the blight spreads, or harvest when the crops are mature and risk your fields exploding if lit on fire.

BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.label: rageblight
BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.letterText: Rageblight has been discovered on the {PLANTDEF_labelPlural}! \An ancient blight said to attract the vengeful spirits of hunted and slaughtered animals, Boomblight is otherwise harmless to plants. \nYou can cut the affected plants before the blight spreads, or harvest when the crops are mature.

BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.label: hypergrowth
BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.letterText: Signs of Hypergrowth have been discovered on the {PLANTDEF_labelPlural}! \Hypergrowth is a strange disease that makes crops grow twice as fast, but yield far less. \nYou can cut the affected plants before the blight spreads, or harvest when the crops are mature for one-third of their normal yield.

BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.label: transformer mechanites
BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.letterText: Transformer Mechanites have been discovered on the {PLANTDEF_labelPlural}! \Semi-coherent mechanites that spread throughout plants, Transformer Mechanites destroy the organic material within plants, leaving behind only metal. \nYou can cut the affected plants before the blight spreads, or harvest when the crops are mature to obtain a small amount of various metals

BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.label: waster's breath
BlightsExpanded.CustomBlightDef.letterText: Waster's Breath has been discovered on the {PLANTDEF_labelPlural}! \nWorshipped by many Waster cultures, Waster's Breath causes crops to age 25% faster, but emit toxic gas throughout their lifespans. \nYou can cut the affected plants before the blight spreads, or harvest when the crops are mature.
